All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppUser
Represents a user in the application with authentication credentials.
BaseDatabaseService
Base class of DatabaseService Provides a shared FirebaseFirestore instance for all database services
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
HintDropdownAdapter
This class implements a custom array adapter that disables and grays out the first item of a dropdown in order for it to be a hint.
HintDropdownEnumInterface
Interface for enumerations that provide a display name for dropdown menus.
HintDropdownItemSelectedListener
A custom listener for handling item selections in dropdown (Spinner) menus.
ImageUtils
Utility class for image-related operations.
LoginFragment
A simple Fragment subclass for login.
LoginSignupActivity
Handles user authentication flow by managing the login and signup fragments.
LoginSignupFragment
A simple Fragment subclass for LoginSignup screen.
LoginSignupFragment.onButtonClickListener
 
MainActivity
The main activity that serves as the entry point for the application after login.
Mood
Base class for mood event.
MoodAnger
Subclass of Mood that represents emotional state of anger.
MoodConfusion
Subclass of Mood that represents emotional state of confusion.
MoodDatabaseService
Singleton class to manage mood-related operations with the firestore database Handles all mood-related queries
MoodDisgust
Subclass of Mood that represents emotional state of disgust.
MoodEmotionEnum
Enum that represents mood emotional state.
MoodFear
Subclass of Mood that represents emotional state of fear.
MoodFormFragment
A DialogFragment subclass that implements form for adding and editing moods Use the MoodFormFragment.newInstance(com.example.cmput301_team_project.model.Mood) factory method to create an instance of this fragment.
MoodHappiness
Subclass of Mood that represents emotional state of happiness.
MoodHistoryFragment
A simple Fragment subclass for user mood history screen.
MoodListAdapter
MoodListAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter used to display a list of Mood objects in a ListView.
MoodSadness
Subclass of Mood that represents emotional state of sadness.
MoodShame
Subclass of Mood that represents emotional state of shame.
MoodSocialSituationEnum
Enum that represents mood social situation.
MoodSurprise
Subclass of Mood that represents emotional state of surprise.
SessionManager
A singleton class that manages the user session.
SignupFragment
A simple Fragment subclass for signup.
UserDatabaseService
Singleton class to manage user-related operations with the firestore database Handles all user-related queries
